Being offline for brief periods of time will result in small inactivity penalities, but will be recouped easily after being online again for about the same amount of time. sToVAS.value: The block producer then checks the next validator in line, and once again determines if a withdrawal needs to be processed or not. This process is repeated until either 16 eligible withdrawals have been found, or until 16,384 validators have been checked, whichever comes first. At that point, the withdrawal queue is sent to the execution layer to be included at the end of the next block.

sZK38z.value: Instead of a new transaction type being used for stakers to manually request withdrawals, accounts are automatically checked for eligible excess balance every few days. All validators are checked on an endless loop, and any available rewards or exited funds are automatically “pushed” into a provided withdrawal account.
